revision.text:
{{{info|page name= Summary Timeline}}}
{{{for template|Summary Timeline}}} The output of this form will be saved to a page entitled " Summary Timeline" (it will add "Summary Timeline" to the end). Use something that is not tied to a date like "Lab LTL IFHX R&R EVA 1" or "EVA Ice Cream Sandwich". You may also choose to create multiple versions of your timeline during the development phase such as "EVA Ice Cream Sandwich Version 1" and "EVA Ice Cream Sandwich Version 2". '''Summary Timeline Title:''' {{{field|ST Title|input type=text|size=50|placeholder=FHRC EVA 1 Version B|mandatory}}} Summary Timeline The next field allows you to link the summary timeline to a single related event page. This is optional, but encouraged for events with planning pages. '''Event Title:''' {{{field|EVA Title|input type=text|size=50|placeholder=FHRC EVA 1}}} List any dependencies in the next field. If this event is an EVA dependent on the completion of a prior EVA, list that EVA. If it depends on hardware launching on a vehicle (such as [[SpX-5]]), list the vehicle mission and the hardware page name. '''Depends on''': {{{field|Depends on|class=full-width no-links-allowed|values from namespace=Main|list|placeholder=SpX-5, US EVA 27}}} '''Related Articles:''' {{{field|Related article|class=full-width no-links-allowed|values from namespace=Main|list|placeholder=Related articles}}} '''Duration (HH:MM):''' {{{field|EVA Duration hour|size=2|default=6}}} : {{{field|EVA Duration minute|size=2|default=30}}} '''Color Key:''' If you use the color feature for a task, briefly describe what that color indicates here.
Red{{{field|Color Red Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Orange{{{field|Color Orange Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Yellow{{{field|Color Yellow Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Green{{{field|Color Green Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Blue{{{field|Color Blue Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Purple{{{field|Color Purple Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Pink{{{field|Color Pink Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Gray{{{field|Color Gray Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Black{{{field|Color Black Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
White{{{field|Color White Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
'''Day/Night Band''' {{{field|Include Day Night|input type=radiobutton|values=yes,no|default=no|mandatory}}} Check to include day/night band {{{field|Insolation Duration|size=2|default=50}}} Duration of insolation (minutes)
{{{field|Eclipse Duration|size=2|default=40}}} Duration of eclipse (minutes)
Is the first cycle insolation or eclipse?
{{{field|First Cycle Day Night|input type=radiobutton|values=Insolation,Eclipse|default=day|mandatory}}}
{{{field|First Cycle Duration|size=2|default=15}}} Duration of first cycle (minutes)
Actor 1 Actor 2 Actor 3
Actor name:{{{field|Actor 1 name|input type=text|size=10|placeholder=IV}}} Actor name:{{{field|Actor 2 name|input type=text|size=10|placeholder=EV1}}} Actor name:{{{field|Actor 3 name|input type=text|size=10|placeholder=EV2}}}
Check to include in compact view:{{{field|Actor 1 Display in Compact View|input type=checkbox|default=no}}} Check to include in compact view:{{{field|Actor 2 Display in Compact View|input type=checkbox|default=yes}}} Check to include in compact view:{{{field|Actor 3 Display in Compact View|input type=checkbox|default=yes}}}
Check to enable get-ahead calculator:{{{field|Actor 1 Enable Get Aheads|input type=checkbox|default=no}}} Check to enable get-ahead calculator:{{{field|Actor 2 Enable Get Aheads|input type=checkbox|default=yes}}} Check to enable get-ahead calculator:{{{field|Actor 3 Enable Get Aheads|input type=checkbox|default=yes}}}
{{{field|Actor 1 Tasks|holds template}}} {{{field|Actor 2 Tasks|holds template}}} {{{field|Actor 3 Tasks|holds template}}}
{{{end template}}} {{{for template|Actor 1 Task|multiple|label=Actor 1 Task|embed in field=Summary Timeline[Actor 1 Tasks]|add button text=Add Task}}} {{{field|Title|input type=text|class=full-width|placeholder=Task Title}}}
{{{field|Duration hour|size=1|default=0}}}:{{{field|Duration minute|size=2|default=00}}}
Color: {{{field|Color|input type=dropdown|values=red,orange,yellow,green,blue,purple,pink,gray,black,white|default=gray|mandatory}}} Related articles: {{{field|Related article|class=full-width no-links-allowed|values from namespace=Main|list|placeholder=Related articles}}} Details: {{{field|Free text|input type=textarea|rows=1|class=full-width|autogrow|placeholder=Type full task details here}}}
{{{end template}}} {{{for template|Actor 2 Task|multiple|label=Actor 2 Tasks|embed in field=Summary Timeline[Actor 2 Tasks]|add button text=Add Task}}} {{{field|Title|input type=text|class=full-width|placeholder=Task Title}}}
{{{field|Duration hour|size=1|default=0}}}:{{{field|Duration minute|size=2|default=00}}}
Color: {{{field|Color|input type=dropdown|values=red,orange,yellow,green,blue,purple,pink,gray,black,white|default=gray|mandatory}}} Related articles: {{{field|Related article|class=full-width no-links-allowed|values from namespace=Main|list|placeholder=Related articles}}} Details: {{{field|Free text|input type=textarea|rows=1|class=full-width|autogrow|placeholder=Type full task details here}}}
{{{end template}}} {{{for template|Actor 3 Task|multiple|label=Actor 3 Tasks|embed in field=Summary Timeline[Actor 3 Tasks]|add button text=Add Task}}} {{{field|Title|input type=text|class=full-width|placeholder=Task Title}}}
{{{field|Duration hour|size=1|default=0}}}:{{{field|Duration minute|size=2|default=00}}}
Color: {{{field|Color|input type=dropdown|values=red,orange,yellow,green,blue,purple,pink,gray,black,white|default=gray|mandatory}}} Related articles: {{{field|Related article|class=full-width no-links-allowed|values from namespace=Main|list|placeholder=Related articles}}} Details: {{{field|Free text|input type=textarea|rows=1|class=full-width|autogrow|placeholder=Type full task details here}}}
{{{end template}}} == Free text == {{{standard input|free text|rows=0}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}} This is the "Summary Timeline" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Summary Timeline}} [[Category:Form Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]
{{#default_form:Summary Timeline}} [[Category:Category Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]

<noinclude> [[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]] </noinclude><includeonly> &&&{{{Title|}}}@@@{{{Duration hour|}}}@@@{{{Duration minute|}}}@@@{{{Related article|}}}@@@{{{Color|}}}@@@{{{Free text|}}} </includeonly>

<noinclude>
This template is used with the Summary Timeline form.

[[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]
</noinclude><includeonly>{{#set_internal:Task
|Index={{#counter: Actor2 }}
|Actor={{#var:Actor2name}}
|Has text title={{{Title|}}}
|Assigned to#list=Actor2
|Duration={{{Duration hour|00}}}:{{{Duration minute|00}}}
|Duration hour={{{Duration hour|00}}}
|Duration minute={{{Duration minute|00}}}
|Duration in minutes={{#expr: (({{{Duration hour|0}}} * 60) + {{{Duration minute|0}}}) }}
|Related article#list={{{Related article|}}}
|Color={{{Color|}}}
|Free text={{{Free text|}}}
|From page={{FULLPAGENAME}}
|EVA title={{#var:EVATitle}}
|Parent related article#list={{#var:pageRelatedArticle}}
|EVA Duration={{#var:EVADurationHour}}:{{#var:EVADurationMinute}}
|Color White Meaning={{#var:ColorWhiteMeaning}}
|Color Black Meaning={{#var:ColorBlackMeaning}}
|Color Gray Meaning={{#var:ColorGrayMeaning}}
|Color Red Meaning={{#var:ColorRedMeaning}}
|Color Orange Meaning={{#var:ColorOrangeMeaning}}
|Color Yellow Meaning={{#var:ColorYellowMeaning}}
|Color Blue Meaning={{#var:ColorBlueMeaning}}
|Color Green Meaning={{#var:ColorGreenMeaning}}
|Color Pink Meaning={{#var:ColorPinkMeaning}}
|Color Purple Meaning={{#var:ColorPurpleMeaning}}
}}</includeonly>

<noinclude>
This template is used with the Summary Timeline form.

[[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]
</noinclude><includeonly>{{#set_internal:Task
|Index={{#counter: Actor3 }}
|Actor={{#var:Actor3name}}
|Has text title={{{Title|}}}
|Assigned to#list=Actor3
|Duration={{{Duration hour|00}}}:{{{Duration minute|00}}}
|Duration hour={{{Duration hour|00}}}
|Duration minute={{{Duration minute|00}}}
|Duration in minutes={{#expr: (({{{Duration hour|0}}} * 60) + {{{Duration minute|0}}}) }}
|Related article#list={{{Related article|}}}
|Color={{{Color|}}}
|Free text={{{Free text|}}}
|From page={{FULLPAGENAME}}
|EVA title={{#var:EVATitle}}
|Parent related article#list={{#var:pageRelatedArticle}}
|EVA Duration={{#var:EVADurationHour}}:{{#var:EVADurationMinute}}
}}</includeonly>

<noinclude>
This template is used with the Summary Timeline form.

[[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]
</noinclude><includeonly>{{#set_internal:Task
|Index={{#counter: Actor1 }}
|Actor={{#var:Actor1name}}
|Has text title={{{Title|}}}
|Assigned to#list=Actor1
|Duration={{{Duration hour|00}}}:{{{Duration minute|00}}}
|Duration hour={{{Duration hour|00}}}
|Duration minute={{{Duration minute|00}}}
|Duration in minutes={{#expr: (({{{Duration hour|0}}} * 60) + {{{Duration minute|0}}}) }}
|Related article#list={{{Related article|}}}
|Color={{{Color|}}}
|Free text={{{Free text|}}}
|From page={{FULLPAGENAME}}
|EVA title={{#var:EVATitle}}
|Parent related article#list={{#var:pageRelatedArticle}}
|EVA Duration={{#var:EVADurationHour}}:{{#var:EVADurationMinute}}
}}</includeonly>

<noinclude>
This is the "Summary Timeline" template.
It should be called by using the Summary Timeline form.

Edit the page to see the template text.

[[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]
</noinclude><includeonly>

<!-- THIS IS WHAT THE USER SEES -->
To display the output on another page, use the following template:

Compact version: <nowiki>{{Summary Timeline Output | </nowiki>{{PAGENAME}}<nowiki> }}</nowiki>

Compact version with fixed pixel width (change "400"): <nowiki>{{Summary Timeline Output | </nowiki>{{PAGENAME}}<nowiki> | Compact | 400 }}</nowiki>

Full version: <nowiki>{{Summary Timeline Output | </nowiki>{{PAGENAME}}<nowiki> | Full }}</nowiki>

{{Summary Timeline Output | {{PAGENAME}} }}


{{Summary Timeline Output | {{PAGENAME}} | Full }}

<!-- SET VARIABLES TO PASS TO TASKS -->
{{#vardefine:EVATitle|{{{EVA Title|}}}}}
{{#vardefine:pageRelatedArticle|{{#arraymap:{{{Related article|}}}|,|x|[[x]]}}}}
{{#vardefine:EVADurationHour|{{{EVA Duration hour|}}}}}
{{#vardefine:EVADurationMinute|{{{EVA Duration minute|}}}}}
{{#vardefine:DependsOn|{{{Depends on|}}}}}
{{#vardefine:Actor1name|{{{Actor 1 name|Actor 1}}}}}
{{#vardefine:Actor2name|{{{Actor 2 name|Actor 2}}}}}
{{#vardefine:Actor3name|{{{Actor 3 name|Actor 3}}}}}

<!-- SET PROPERTIES OF SUMMARY TIMELINE -->
{{#set: EVA title = {{{EVA Title|}}} }}
{{#set: ST title = {{{ST Title|}}} }}
{{#set: Duration hour = {{{EVA Duration hour|}}} }}
{{#set: Duration minute = {{{EVA Duration minute|}}} }}
{{#set: Actor 1 name = {{{Actor 1 name|Actor 1}}} }}
{{#set: Actor 2 name = {{{Actor 2 name|Actor 2}}} }}
{{#set: Actor 3 name = {{{Actor 3 name|Actor 3}}} }}
{{#set: Actor 1 Display in Compact View = {{{Actor 1 Display in Compact View|}}} }}
{{#set: Actor 2 Display in Compact View = {{{Actor 2 Display in Compact View|}}} }}
{{#set: Actor 3 Display in Compact View = {{{Actor 3 Display in Compact View|}}} }}
{{#set: Actor 1 Enable Get Aheads = {{{Actor 1 Enable Get Aheads|}}} }}
{{#set: Actor 2 Enable Get Aheads = {{{Actor 2 Enable Get Aheads|}}} }}
{{#set: Actor 3 Enable Get Aheads = {{{Actor 3 Enable Get Aheads|}}} }}
{{#arraymap:{{{Depends on|}}}|,|x|{{#set: Depends on=x}}}}
{{#arraymap:{{{Related article|}}}|,|x|{{#set: Related article=x}}}}
{{#set: Color Gray Meaning={{{Color Gray Meaning|}}}}}
{{#set: Color Black Meaning={{{Color Black Meaning|}}}}}
{{#set: Color White Meaning={{{Color White Meaning|}}}}}
{{#set: Color Red Meaning={{{Color Red Meaning|}}}}}
{{#set: Color Orange Meaning={{{Color Orange Meaning|}}}}}
{{#set: Color Yellow Meaning={{{Color Yellow Meaning|}}}}}
{{#set: Color Blue Meaning={{{Color Blue Meaning|}}}}}
{{#set: Color Green Meaning={{{Color Green Meaning|}}}}}
{{#set: Color Pink Meaning={{{Color Pink Meaning|}}}}}
{{#set: Color Purple Meaning={{{Color Purple Meaning|}}}}}
{{#set: Insolation Duration={{{Insolation Duration|}}}}}
{{#set: Eclipse Duration={{{Eclipse Duration|}}}}}
{{#set: Include Day Night={{{Include Day Night|}}}}}
{{#set: First Cycle Day Night={{{First Cycle Day Night|}}}}}
{{#set: First Cycle Duration={{{First Cycle Duration|}}}}}

<!-- SET INTERNAL OBJECTS -->
{{{Actor 1 Tasks|}}}{{{Actor 2 Tasks|}}}{{{Actor 3 Tasks|}}}

[[Category:Summary Timeline]]</includeonly>

For the compact version (default): 
{{Summary Timeline Output | Page name of summary timeline to display | Compact }}
To force the compact version to a fixed pixel width to fit on a specific page: 
{{Summary Timeline Output | Page name of summary timeline to display | Compact | 123 }}
For the full version: 
{{Summary Timeline Output | Page name of summary timeline to display | Full }}
